snippet.title: What is a t-shirt craft for kids
snippet.description: Tie dye, or get a foam stamp thingie, then dip it in paint and design a white t shirt. Or, buy some cheap fabric pens and go curazzzy on a t. Have fun, I hope this helped.

snippet.title: What kids can do on a rainy evening
snippet.description: Read, play board games, play video games, draw, sleep, watch TV, watch a movie, watch the rain, sing, dance, jump, imagine, stack blocks, just look around the house for anything.
